bibl.title: Letter from Daniel R. Anthony, Jr., to Mabel H. Lazear, June 19, 1922

div1.p: Anthony informs Mabel Lazear that the item covering her annuity has passed the House and the Senate.

Dear Madam:
div1.p:
This will acknowledge receipt of your letter
of June 10. In reply, beg to advise that the item
covering your annuity in the Army appropriation bill,
has passed both the House and Senate, and is now in
conference, so that you will undoubtedly be taken
care of for the next fiscal year.
Thanking you for writing me, I am,
